page.title: 09Arts Festival in Wimborne
page.content: The largest ever Wimborne Minster Arts Festival will be held this month from June 22nd to July 6th. The Bournemouth Sinfonietta, the King's Singers, the Yetties and a B.B.C. Young Musician of the Year (Anna Markland) will be taking part. There will be many local people taking part as well as the more famous names. The festival will have an orchestra of sixty from the Upper Schools in Wimborne. They will take part in a workshop and performance conducted by Owain Arwel Hughes. Local schools will hold their own lunchtime concert each day during the festival fortnight. The festival is now believed to be one of the biggest events of its kind in the country. PATRICIA CAPEWELL. (TEACHER).
